description: Central elements in 4-Pascal triangle A028275 (by row).
comments: Equals A000984, [1, 2, 6, 20, 70,...] convolved with [1, 2, 0, 0, 0,...]. [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Jun 05 2009]
formula: C(n)*(6n-2), where C(n) are the Catalan numbers (A000108). - _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 24 2003
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
